mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_SECTOR_HW_1X_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.LOCAL_CELL_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID AS "扇区标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",case ne.CITY_NAME when '江汉' then ne.COUNTY_NAME else ne.CITY_NAME end as "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN "扇区所属MSC标识",'' "扇区所属MGW标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME AS "扇区所属BSC标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID AS "扇区所属BTS标识", V1.SECTOR_ID "扇区编号",ne.CHINA_NAME "扇区名称", to_char(V1.PRAT) AS "MP1.4.1.6.1", '' "#" FROM (select CELL.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_CELL_C CELL, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where CELL.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join PARA_CELL_SCTSCHM_HW V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.NE_SYS_ID) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0808'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_SECTOR_ZTE_1X_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID AS "扇区标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",case ne.CITY_NAME when '江汉' then ne.COUNTY_NAME else ne.CITY_NAME end as "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN "扇区所属MSC标识",'' "扇区所属MGW标识", NE.BSC_NAME AS "扇区所属BSC标识", NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID AS "扇区所属BTS标识", V1.SECTOR_ID "扇区编号",ne.CHINA_NAME "扇区名称", to_char(V1.RADIUS) AS "MP2.4.1.1.1", to_char(V3.TOTAL_ZONES) AS "MP2.4.1.2.1", to_char(V3.ZONE_TIMER) AS "MP2.4.1.2.2", to_char(V3.MULT_SIDS) AS "MP2.4.1.2.3", to_char(V3.MULT_NIDS) AS "MP2.4.1.2.4", to_char(V3.HOME_REG) AS "MP2.4.1.2.5", to_char(V3.FOR_SID_REG) AS "MP2.4.1.2.6", to_char(V3.FOR_NID_REG) AS "MP2.4.1.2.7", to_char(V3.POWER_UP_REG) AS "MP2.4.1.2.8", to_char(V3.POWER_DOWN_REG) AS "MP2.4.1.2.9", to_char(V3.PARAMETER_REG) AS "MP2.4.1.2.10", to_char(V3.REG_PRD) AS "MP2.4.1.2.11", to_char(V3.REG_DIST) AS "MP2.4.1.2.12", to_char(V3.MAX_SLOT_CYCLE_INDEX) AS "MP2.4.1.2.13", to_char(V3.BCAST_INDEX) AS "MP2.4.1.2.14", to_char(V5.PWR_REP_THRESH) AS "MP2.4.1.4.1", to_char(V5.PWR_REP_FRAMES) AS "MP2.4.1.4.2", to_char(V5.PWR_THRESH_ENABLE) AS "MP2.4.1.4.3", to_char(V5.PWR_PERIOD_ENABLE) AS "MP2.4.1.4.4", to_char(V5.PWR_REP_DELAY) AS "MP2.4.1.4.5", to_char(V4.RLGAIN_TRAFFIC_PILOT) AS "MP2.4.1.4.6", to_char(V4.RLGAIN_SCH_PILOT) AS "MP2.4.1.4.7", to_char(V2.T_ADD_VOICE) AS "MP2.4.1.5.1", to_char(V2.T_ADD_DATA) AS "MP2.4.1.5.2", to_char(V2.T_DROP_VOICE) AS "MP2.4.1.5.3", to_char(V2.T_DROP_DATA) AS "MP2.4.1.5.4", to_char(V2.T_COMP_VOICE) AS "MP2.4.1.5.5", to_char(V2.T_COMP_DATA) AS "MP2.4.1.5.6", to_char(V2.T_TDROP_VOICE) AS "MP2.4.1.5.7", to_char(V2.T_TDROP_DATA) AS "MP2.4.1.5.8", to_char(V2.SOFT_SLOPE_VOICE) AS "MP2.4.1.5.9", to_char(V2.SOFT_SLOPE_DATA) AS "MP2.4.1.5.10", to_char(V2.ADD_INTERCEPT_VOICE) AS "MP2.4.1.5.11", to_char(V2.ADD_INTERCEPT_DATA) AS "MP2.4.1.5.12", to_char(V2.DROP_INTERCEPT_VOICE) AS "MP2.4.1.5.13", to_char(V2.DROP_INTERCEPT_DATA) AS "MP2.4.1.5.14", to_char(V1.PILOT_INC) AS "MP2.4.1.5.15", to_char(V1.SRCH_WIN_A) AS "MP2.4.1.5.16", to_char(V1.SRCH_WIN_N) AS "MP2.4.1.5.17", to_char(V1.SRCH_WIN_R) AS "MP2.4.1.5.18", to_char(V1.NGHBR_MAX_AGE) AS "MP2.4.1.5.19", to_char(V3.PAGECH_PRAT) AS "MP2.4.1.6.1", '' "#" FROM (select CELL.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_CELL_C CELL, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where CELL.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join PARA_R_3G_T_CELL_ZTE V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.NE_SYS_ID) inner join PARA_R_3G_T_HANDOFF_ZTE V2 on (V1.NE_SYS_ID = V2.NE_SYS_ID AND V1.STAMPTIME = V2.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_R_3G_T_SYS_PARA_ZTE V3 on (V2.NE_SYS_ID = V3.NE_SYS_ID AND V2.STAMPTIME = V3.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_ZTE_R_3G_S_GAIN V4 on (V3.NE_SYS_ID = V4.NE_SYS_ID AND V3.STAMPTIME = V4.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_ZTE_R_3G_T_PWR_REP V5 on (V4.NE_SYS_ID = V5.NE_SYS_ID AND V4.STAMPTIME = V5.STAMPTIME) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0804'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_SECTOR_ZTE_DO_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID AS "扇区标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",case ne.CITY_NAME when '江汉' then ne.COUNTY_NAME else ne.CITY_NAME end as "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN "扇区所属MSC标识",'' "扇区所属MGW标识", NE.BSC_NAME AS "扇区所属BSC标识", NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID AS "扇区所属BTS标识", V1.SECTOR_ID "扇区编号",ne.CHINA_NAME "扇区名称", to_char(V1.SEARCHWINDOWACTIVE) AS "MP2.4.2.5.1", to_char(V1.SEARCHWINDOWNB) AS "MP2.4.2.5.2", to_char(V1.SEARCHWINDOWREM) AS "MP2.4.2.5.3", to_char(V1.PILOTADD1) AS "MP2.4.2.5.4", to_char(V1.PILOTCOMPARE1) AS "MP2.4.2.5.5", to_char(V1.PILOTDROP1) AS "MP2.4.2.5.6", to_char(V1.PILOTDROPTIMER1) AS "MP2.4.2.5.7", to_char(V1.SOFTSLOPE1) AS "MP2.4.2.5.8", to_char(V1.ADDINTERCEPT1) AS "MP2.4.2.5.9", to_char(V1.DROPINTERCEPT1) AS "MP2.4.2.5.10", '' "#" FROM (select CELL.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_CELL_C CELL, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where CELL.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join PARA_R_H_S_HO_PARA_ZTE V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.NE_SYS_ID) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0804'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_SECTOR_ALU_1X_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID AS "扇区标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",case ne.CITY_NAME when '江汉' then ne.COUNTY_NAME else ne.CITY_NAME end as "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN "扇区所属MSC标识",'' "扇区所属MGW标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID AS "扇区所属BSC标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID || '.' || NE.BTS_ID AS "扇区所属BTS标识", V1.SECTOR_ID "扇区编号",ne.CHINA_NAME "扇区名称", to_char(V1.PILOT_GAIN) AS "MP4.4.1.1.1", to_char(V1.PAGING_GAIN) AS "MP4.4.1.1.2", to_char(V1.SYNC_GAIN) AS "MP4.4.1.1.3", to_char(V1.FNIDREG) AS "MP4.4.1.2.1", to_char(V1.MLTSIDSTR) AS "MP4.4.1.2.2", to_char(V1.MLTNIDSTR) AS "MP4.4.1.2.3", to_char(V1.NOM_PWR) AS "MP4.4.1.3.1", to_char(V1.INIT_PWR) AS "MP4.4.1.3.2", to_char(V1.PWR_STEP) AS "MP4.4.1.3.3", to_char(V1.NUM_STEP) AS "MP4.4.1.3.4", to_char(V1.ACC_TMO) AS "MP4.4.1.3.5", to_char(V1.MAX_REQ_SEQ) AS "MP4.4.1.3.6", to_char(V1.MAX_RSP_SEQ) AS "MP4.4.1.3.7", to_char(V1.MAX_CAP_SZ) AS "MP4.4.1.3.8", to_char(V1.PAM_SZ) AS "MP4.4.1.3.9", to_char(V1.PROBE_PN_RAN) AS "MP4.4.1.3.10", to_char(V1.PROBE_BKOFF) AS "MP4.4.1.3.11", to_char(V1.BKOFF) AS "MP4.4.1.3.12", to_char(V1.PWRREPFRAMES) AS "MP4.4.1.4.1", to_char(V1.T_ADD) AS "MP4.4.1.5.1", to_char(V1.T_DROP) AS "MP4.4.1.5.2", to_char(V1.T_COMP) AS "MP4.4.1.5.3", to_char(V1.T_TDROP) AS "MP4.4.1.5.4", to_char(V1.SRCHWINA) AS "MP4.4.1.5.5", to_char(V1.SRCHWINN) AS "MP4.4.1.5.6", to_char(V1.SRCHWINR) AS "MP4.4.1.5.7", to_char(V1.PILOT_INC_MUX) AS "MP4.4.1.5.8", '' "#" FROM (select CELL.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_CELL_C CELL, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where CELL.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join PARA_LUC_CEQFACE V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.NE_SYS_ID) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0810'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_SECTOR_ALU_DO_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID AS "扇区标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",case ne.CITY_NAME when '江汉' then ne.COUNTY_NAME else ne.CITY_NAME end as "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN "扇区所属MSC标识",'' "扇区所属MGW标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID AS "扇区所属BSC标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID || '.' || NE.BTS_ID AS "扇区所属BTS标识", V1.SECTOR_ID "扇区编号",ne.CHINA_NAME "扇区名称", to_char(V1.DORMANCYTIMER) AS "MP4.4.2.1.1", to_char(V1.CCSYNCAPSULEOFFSET) AS "MP4.4.2.1.2", to_char(V1.CONTROLCHANNELRATE) AS "MP4.4.2.1.3", to_char(V1.PROBENUMSETUP) AS "MP4.4.2.3.1", to_char(V1.PREAMBLELENGTH) AS "MP4.4.2.3.2", to_char(V1.PROBEBACKOFF) AS "MP4.4.2.3.3", to_char(V1.CAPSULELENGTHMAX) AS "MP4.4.2.3.4", to_char(V1.OPENLOOPADJUST) AS "MP4.4.2.4.1", to_char(V1.PILOTCOMPARE) AS "MP4.4.2.5.1", to_char(V1.PILOTDROP) AS "MP4.4.2.5.2", to_char(V1.PILOTDROPTIMER) AS "MP4.4.2.5.3", to_char(V1.SOFTSLOPE) AS "MP4.4.2.5.4", to_char(V1.ADDINTERCEPT) AS "MP4.4.2.5.5", to_char(V1.DROPINTERCEPT) AS "MP4.4.2.5.6", to_char(V1.SEARCHWINDOWACTIVE) AS "MP4.4.2.5.7", to_char(V1.RABOFFSET) AS "MP4.4.2.20.1", '' "#" FROM (select CELL.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_CELL_C CELL, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where CELL.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join PARA_LUC_DO_SECTOR V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.NE_SYS_ID) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0810'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_BTS_ZTE_1X_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", case NE.VENDOR when 'ZY0808' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID when 'ZY0810' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID || '.' || NE.BTS_ID WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID END "基站标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",case ne.CITY_NAME when '江汉' then ne.COUNTY_NAME else ne.CITY_NAME end as "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN "MSC标识",'' "MGW标识", case NE.VENDOR when 'ZY0808' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME when 'ZY0810' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN NE.BSC_NAME END AS "BSC标识", to_char(V1.ALLOWMINFSCHDURCODE) AS "MP2.3.1.7.1", to_char(V1.ALLOWMAXFSCHDURCODE) AS "MP2.3.1.7.2", '' "#" FROM (select BTS.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_BTS_C BTS, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where BTS.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join PARA_ZTE_R_3G_T_FWDPOWER_1X V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.NE_SYS_ID) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0804'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_BTS_ALU_1X_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", case NE.VENDOR when 'ZY0808' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID when 'ZY0810' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID || '.' || NE.BTS_ID WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID END AS "基站标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",case ne.CITY_NAME when '江汉' then ne.COUNTY_NAME else ne.CITY_NAME end as "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN "MSC标识",'' "MGW标识", case NE.VENDOR when 'ZY0808' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME when 'ZY0810' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN NE.BSC_NAME END AS "BSC标识", to_char(V1.ZONE_TMR) AS "MP4.3.1.2.1", to_char(V1.TOTZONES) AS "MP4.3.1.2.2", to_char(V1.HOMEREG) AS "MP4.3.1.2.3", to_char(V1.FSIDREG) AS "MP4.3.1.2.4", to_char(V1.PUPD_C) AS "MP4.3.1.2.5", '' "#" FROM (select BTS.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_BTS_C BTS, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where BTS.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join PARA_LUC_CELL2 V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.NE_SYS_ID) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0810'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_BSC_HW_ALL_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.CHINA_NAME "BSC标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",NE.CITY_NAMES "城市列表", ne.MSC_SIGN "MSC标识",'' "MGW标识", to_char(V3.ACMACRODIVSW) AS "MP1.2.0.3.1", to_char(V4.PNINC) AS "MP1.2.0.5.1", to_char(V1.HHOMAXTARGNUM) AS "MP1.2.0.5.2", to_char(V1.INTRABSCHHOSW) AS "MP1.2.0.5.3", to_char(V1.INTERBSCHHOSW) AS "MP1.2.0.5.4", to_char(V6.INTERBSCHHOSW) AS "MP1.2.0.5.5", to_char(V3.SCHRELDTXDUR) AS "MP1.2.0.7.1", to_char(V3.SPT16XREVSCHSW) AS "MP1.2.0.8.1", to_char(V3.FWDSCH32XSW) AS "MP1.2.0.8.2", to_char(V3.REVSCH32XSW) AS "MP1.2.0.8.3", to_char(V2.TRGARFCN) AS "MP1.2.0.9.1", to_char(V2.STRTIME) AS "MP1.2.0.9.2", to_char(V2.STOPTIME) AS "MP1.2.0.9.3", to_char(V3.FWDSCHSHOSW) AS "MP1.2.0.10.1", to_char(V3.REVSCHSHOSW) AS "MP1.2.0.10.2", to_char(V3.FWDSASTHR) AS "MP1.2.0.10.3", to_char(V3.FWDSASMAXNUM) AS "MP1.2.0.10.4", to_char(V3.REVSASTHR) AS "MP1.2.0.10.5", to_char(V3.REVSASMAXNUM) AS "MP1.2.0.10.6", to_char(V3.FWDSCHVARRATESW) AS "MP1.2.0.10.7", to_char(V3.REVSCHVARRATESW) AS "MP1.2.0.10.8", to_char(V3.REVSCHEXTSW) AS "MP1.2.0.10.9", to_char(V3.REVSCHEXTFOREDURSW) AS "MP1.2.0.10.10", to_char(V3.FWDSCHEXTSW) AS "MP1.2.0.10.11", to_char(V5.RTT) AS "MP1.2.0.10.12", to_char(V5.NAKROUNDSFWD) AS "MP1.2.0.10.13", to_char(V5.NAKROUNDSREV) AS "MP1.2.0.10.14", to_char(V5.NAKPERROUNDFWD0) AS "MP1.2.0.10.15", to_char(V5.NAKPERROUNDFWD1) AS "MP1.2.0.10.16", to_char(V5.NAKPERROUNDFWD2) AS "MP1.2.0.10.17", to_char(V5.NAKPERROUNDREV0) AS "MP1.2.0.10.18", to_char(V5.NAKPERROUNDREV1) AS "MP1.2.0.10.19", to_char(V5.NAKPERROUNDREV2) AS "MP1.2.0.10.20", to_char(V7.QOSFUNSW) AS "MP1.2.0.10.21", to_char(V7.GOLDFSCHRATE) AS "MP1.2.0.10.22", to_char(V7.GOLDRSCHRATE) AS "MP1.2.0.10.23", to_char(V7.SILVERFSCHRATE) AS "MP1.2.0.10.24", to_char(V7.SILVERRSCHRATE) AS "MP1.2.0.10.25", to_char(V7.BRONZEFSCHRATE) AS "MP1.2.0.10.26", to_char(V7.BRONZERSCHRATE) AS "MP1.2.0.10.27", to_char(V7.DATASW) AS "MP1.2.0.10.28", to_char(V8.SMOOTHPERIOD) AS "MP1.2.0.10.29", to_char(V8.SCHLOCKTHRESHOLD) AS "MP1.2.0.10.30", to_char(V8.SCHRETRYTIME) AS "MP1.2.0.10.31", to_char(V8.INACTIVETIMERLEN) AS "MP1.2.0.10.32", to_char(V8.REXMITFRAMETHRESHOLD) AS "MP1.2.0.10.33", to_char(V8.SCHSTOPTHRESHOLD) AS "MP1.2.0.10.34", to_char(V8.SCHSTOPCHECKCOUNT) AS "MP1.2.0.10.35", '' "#" FROM (select BSC.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN,CELL.CITY_NAMES from NE_BSC_C BSC, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC, (select RELATED_BSC,replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when CITY_NAME = '江汉' then county_name else CITY_NAME end), ',', '|') CITY_NAMES from ne_CELL_c group by related_bsc) CELL where BSC.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC and BSC.NE_SYS_ID = CELL.RELATED_BSC) NE inner join PARA_BSC_BSCHO_HW V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.NE_SYS_ID) inner join PARA_BSC_BSCRSM_HW V2 on (V1.NE_SYS_ID = V2.NE_SYS_ID AND V1.STAMPTIME = V2.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_BSC_CHM_HW V3 on (V2.NE_SYS_ID = V3.NE_SYS_ID AND V2.STAMPTIME = V3.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_BSC_HW V4 on (V3.NE_SYS_ID = V4.NE_SYS_ID AND V3.STAMPTIME = V4.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_BSC_RLPBLOB_HW V5 on (V4.NE_SYS_ID = V5.NE_SYS_ID AND V4.STAMPTIME = V5.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_HW_ODTMOC_NBRBSCFUNC V6 on (V5.NE_SYS_ID = V6.NE_SYS_ID AND V5.STAMPTIME = V6.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_QOS_HW V7 on (V6.NE_SYS_ID = V7.NE_SYS_ID AND V6.STAMPTIME = V7.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_SDU1XRLP_HW V8 on (V7.NE_SYS_ID = V8.NE_SYS_ID AND V7.STAMPTIME = V8.STAMPTIME) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0808'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_BSC_ZTE_1X_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", case NE.VENDOR when 'ZY0808' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.CHINA_NAME when 'ZY0810' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN NE.CHINA_NAME ELSE NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.CHINA_NAME END AS "BSC标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",ne.CITY_NAMES "城市列表", ne.MSC_SIGN "MSC标识",'' "MGW标识", to_char(V1.PWR_CNTL_STEP1) AS "MP2.2.1.4.1", to_char(V1.PWR_CNTL_STEP2) AS "MP2.2.1.4.2", to_char(V1.PWR_CNTL_STEP3) AS "MP2.2.1.4.3", to_char(V1.FPC_SUBCHAN_GAIN1) AS "MP2.2.1.4.4", to_char(V1.FPC_SUBCHAN_GAIN2) AS "MP2.2.1.4.5", to_char(V1.FPC_SUBCHAN_GAIN3) AS "MP2.2.1.4.6", '' "#" FROM (select BSC.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN,CELL.CITY_NAMES from NE_BSC_C BSC, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC, (select RELATED_BSC,replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when CITY_NAME = '江汉' then county_name else CITY_NAME end), ',', '|') CITY_NAMES from ne_CELL_c group by related_bsc) CELL where BSC.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC AND BSC.NE_SYS_ID = CELL.RELATED_BSC) NE inner join PARA_ZTE_R_3G_S_FWDPOWER_1X V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.NE_SYS_ID) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0804'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_BSC_ZTE_DO_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", case NE.VENDOR when 'ZY0808' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.CHINA_NAME when 'ZY0810' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN NE.CHINA_NAME ELSE NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.CHINA_NAME END AS "BSC标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",ne.CITY_NAMES "城市列表", ne.MSC_SIGN "MSC标识",'' "MGW标识", to_char(V1.PROBESEQUENCEMAX) AS "MP2.2.2.1.1", to_char(V1.DRCLOCKPERIOD) AS "MP2.2.2.1.2", to_char(V1.DRCLOCKLENGTH) AS "MP2.2.2.1.3", to_char(V1.MUPACKETSENABLED) AS "MP2.2.2.1.4", to_char(V1.DSCLENGTH) AS "MP2.2.2.1.5", to_char(V1.SPENABLEDTHRESH) AS "MP2.2.2.1.6", to_char(V1.DRCSUPERVISIONTIMER) AS "MP2.2.2.1.7", to_char(V1.DSCCHANNELGAINBOOST) AS "MP2.2.2.1.8", to_char(V1.DRCCHANNELGAINBOOST) AS "MP2.2.2.1.9", to_char(V1.PROBEBACKOFF) AS "MP2.2.2.3.1", to_char(V1.PROBESEQBACKOFF) AS "MP2.2.2.3.2", to_char(V1.ACCDATAOFFSETNOM) AS "MP2.2.2.3.3", to_char(V1.ACCDATAOFFSET9K6) AS "MP2.2.2.3.4", to_char(V1.APERSISTENCEOR) AS "MP2.2.2.3.5", to_char(V1.ATACCESSRATEMAX) AS "MP2.2.2.3.6", to_char(V1.SOFTHODELAY) AS "MP2.2.2.5.1", '' "#" FROM (select BSC.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN,CELL.CITY_NAMES from NE_BSC_C BSC, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC, (select RELATED_BSC,replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when CITY_NAME = '江汉' then county_name else CITY_NAME end), ',', '|') CITY_NAMES from ne_CELL_c group by related_bsc) CELL where BSC.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC AND BSC.NE_SYS_ID = CELL.RELATED_BSC) NE inner join PARA_ZTE_R_H_S_CFG_PARA V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.NE_SYS_ID) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0804'
